title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that adds Ollama models as first-class citizens inside LangChain LLM & chat components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama comparable to ChatGPT UI; chat history, model switching, multi-user, RAG uploads.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama API with readline prompts, conversation history, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot (Visual Studio Code)
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as an inline coding assistant.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; ingest PDFs and query locally.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers prompts via your local Ollama instance; slash commands, model switching.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama4j (Java SDK)
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama; synchronous/asynchronous APIs, model management, streaming chat.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM integrations inside pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with strongly-typed models, dependency-injection helpers, and streaming support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed REST bindings and WebSocket streaming for Ollama.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within your knowledge-base notes.

title: ollama-nextjs-template
summary: Starter repo showing how to build a ChatGPT-like web app with Next.js, Vercel AI SDK, and Ollama backend.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin for summarizing, translating, or continuing text using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by the community; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-gui-electron
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Electron; supports multiple chats, markdown, and system prompts.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that answers channel mentions using your local Ollama instance; ephemeral or threaded replies.
